document_data.name: Belching Dragon
document_data.mainbody: The '''Belching Dragon''' was a tavern located in the town of [[Nashkel]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]]. It was rather run-of-the-mill and offered a standard variety of drinks at reasonable prices.
document_data.Services:
The Belching Dragon had the following drinks:
* [[Dragon's Breath Beer]]: 1 [[gp]]
* [[Mead]]: 4 gp
* [[Westgate Ruby]]: 1 gp
* [[Arabellan Dry]]: 2 gp
* [[Saerloonian Topaz]]: 1 gp
